section.name: Accounting of purchase returns.
section.p:
On 16 Jan Bob found that 12 eggs and 1 pound of cheese are not fresh. At first he switched off entries source #15 " Purchase return. Debit Returns Receivable per vendor, Credit Sales Tax Payable from returns per Tax for tax amount.". Then he has made purchase return to Carlo's grocery:
* you can change cost (price) (it's still picked automatically), and you can change tax amount (if taxes are extracted from purchase).
Field Site from is optional. If it's empty then withdrawal will be from the first warehouse site/s with available item/s.
